Package gov.sandia.gmp.util.containers.arraylist

Class ArrayListBits

java.lang.Object
java.util.BitSet
gov.sandia.gmp.util.containers.arraylist.ArrayListBits
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class ArrayListBits extends BitSet

ArrayListBits

ArrayListBits extends java.util.BitSet by adding methods that read/write the bits to/from Scanners and DataInputStreams as a series of bytes. The number of bytes read/written is given by (int)Math.ceil(length()/8.0) where length() is the index of the last bit that is set on, which may be larger or smaller than the number of boolean type values an application may wish manage.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2008

Company: Sandia National Laboratories

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ArrayListBits

      public ArrayListBits()
      Calls BitSet default constructor.

    • ArrayListBits

      public ArrayListBits​(int nbits)
      Creates a bit set whose initial size is large enough to explicitly represent bits with indices in the range 0 through nbits-1. All bits are initially false.

    • ArrayListBits

  • Method Details

    • getByteCode

      public byte[] getByteCode()
      Retrieve a byte[] just big enough to hold the last bit that is set to on.
      Returns:
      byte[]

    • write

      public void write​(DataOutputStream output) throws IOException
      Write the bits out to the specified DataOutputStream as bytes. The number of bytes written will be just enough to include the last bit that is set to on.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • write

      public void write​(Writer output) throws IOException
      Write the bits out to the specified BufferedWriter as bytes. The number of bytes written will be just enough to include the last bit that is set to on.
      Throws:
      IOException
